name: VI006 Miss Strappy Tank
description: Adjustable inbuilt bra with pockets for optional padding. Y back design offers complete support for all fitness activities. Low V neck at front chest for elegant layered effect.

name: VI015 Looped Capri
description: A capri length pant with an elegant self-fabric-looped waist at front. V shaped hem at back of knee.

name: VI018 Peel Down Banana Shorts
description: 3/4 length pants which finish below above knee in the stretchable organic cotton bamboo fabric. Features signature ‘utopia’ motif on the back of three colour tier roll down waist.

name: VI008 Jamie’s Sports Bra
description: Athletic X-back sports bra for total freedom of movement with inbuilt bra with pockets for optional padding and tattoo pattern design along hem.

name: VI010 Wrap Top
description: A second layer of warmth to wrap around you, long sleeve with easy tie up for a snug fit.

name: VI012 Body Wrap
description: Enjoy the blissful lightness of this organic cotton & bamboo from neck to knee with this all-in-one stretchable piece.  The cross over at top makes it an easy slip on, the light rib at waist keeps the garment in place, ideal for acroyoga.

name: VI011 Kurti
description: Enjoy multiple-comforts with this long sleeved kurti.  This easy pull over is perfect for those to and from sessions.

name: V1017 Peel Down Bikers
description: 3/4 length pants which finish below above knee in the stretchable organic cotton bamboo fabric. Features signature ‘utopia’ motif on the back of three colour tier roll down waist.

name: V1002 Baby Neck T
description: Long length baby neck style T shirt.Body skimming for a sleek fit.

name: VI014 Ahimsa Skirted Yoga Pants
description: 3/4 straight leg pants which finish at the knee with embroidered skirt for covering those lumps & bumps.

name: V1001 Gathered Tee
description:
Ultra light and graceful Tee with gathering at the chest. Great for yoga or to don with a pair of jeans. Comfort with feminine allure.

Fabric: 68% Bamboo, 24% Organic Cot

name: V1004 Halter Neck Top
description: Halter neck design with small embroidered ‘utopia’ tattoo at back. Comes with adjustable inbuilt bra pocket for optional padding.

name: Utopia Headband
